actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend title 13, United States Code, to authorize appropriations to carry out the provisions of such title for fiscal year 1979 and to provide that for subsequent fiscal years appropriations shall be subject to annual authorization.

summary.text: Authorizes appropriations to carry out the provisions of Title 13, U.S.C. (Census) for fiscal year 1979. Stipulates that appropriations to carry out the provisions of such Title shall be subject to annual authorization.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 13, United States Code, to authorize appropriations to carry out the provisions of such title for fiscal year 1979 and to provide that for subsequent fiscal years appropriations shall be subject to annual authorization.
